messages.message:
Hey guys,

I've been having some issues getting on `localhost` because of this `ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL_ERROR`.

I've tried rebuilding and re-running all of the `lite` services locally and on docker and have even done all the stuff on the onboarding SSL setup guide (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1c6KaxyYMSpK2-p4vGwiO8OZoKBwJtkQFnhHS9NCMROY/edit#heading=h.v9y6smfeawjw) again :weary:

Do y'all have any suggestions to help me get out of this?
Have you tried running this in an incognito window? You can also try restarting your computer and restarting your VPN
ya, i've tried all of those options :pensive:
Have you tried on the latest version of master?
oh, I am on master but lemme try updating tho :slightly_smiling_face:
Unfortunately getting on the latest version of master didn't really change the situation :pensive:
just to clarify, when you run ppy status does it show that all your services are up? what does it say in your server-nginx logs?

ya, the services are all running.

Where would I find my server-nginx logs?

I couldn't find any .log files under the `webserver/nginx-app` directory :mag:
if yo ugo into docker dashboard, you should be able to click on server-nginx

ohhh, heh

This is the most recent entry in the logs:
